Pentest CheatSheet

Pentest CheatSheet

View on GitHub

Footprinting

Nmap

$ nmap <IP> -p111,2049 -sVC
$ nmap --script nfs* <IP> -sV -p111,2049

NFS Shares

Show Available NFS Shares

$ showmount -e <IP>

Mounting NFS Share

$ mkdir target-NFS
$ sudo mount -t nfs 10.129.14.128:/ ./target-NFS/ -o nolock
$ cd target-NFS
$ tree .

Unmounting

$ sudo umount target-NFS
